meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of birds
meanings.sent1: The aviatic creatures soared gracefully through the sky.
meanings.sent2: The aviatic features of the bird's wings allowed it to fly effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The aviatic behavior of the pigeon made it the envy of all other birds.
meanings.sent4: Her aviatic instincts guided her to safety when danger approached.
meanings.sent5: The aviatic beauty of the eagle in flight was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to aviation or aircraft
meanings.sent1: The aviatic industry plays a crucial role in modern transportation.
meanings.sent2: Pilots undergo extensive training to ensure their aviatic skills are top-notch.
meanings.sent3: The aviatic adventures of the young pilot were filled with excitement and wonder.
meanings.sent4: His dreams of becoming an aviatic engineer finally came true after years of hard work.
meanings.sent5: The aviatic technology used in airplanes continues to advance rapidly.
